### Define variables used in this package
This will need to be run every time I makes changes to the package or the dataset.
```{r}
# devtools::load_all()
POP <- readRDS("data/pop_by_province_20230213.rds")
DAT <- readRDS("data/covid_overall_20230122.rds")
unreported <-
    DAT$cumul_symptomatic[1] - DAT$symptomatic[1]

PARAMETERS <- initialize_params(pop=sum(POP$Total))
OBS <- c(unreported, DAT$symptomatic[1:PARAMETERS$obslength])

usethis::use_data(POP, overwrite=TRUE)
usethis::use_data(DAT, overwrite=TRUE)
usethis::use_data(PARAMETERS, overwrite=TRUE)
usethis::use_data(OBS, overwrite=TRUE)
```
